amendment.description: An amendment numbered 40 printed in House Report 118-158 to prohibit funds in H. R. 4366 from being used to carry out the Administration's climate change executive orders.
amendment.purpose: Amendment prohibits funds from being used to carry out the Administration's climate change executive orders.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A012) Agreed to by recorded vote: 220 - 214 (Roll no. 377).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Roy.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A012) Agreed to by recorded vote: 220 - 214 (Roll no. 377).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
